Package me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.event.type

Class CommandActionEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.event.CommandEvent
      • me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.event.type.CommandActionEvent
  • public class CommandActionEvent
extends CommandEvent
    An event that is provided by CommandActionEventListener

    Contains the ChannelCategory where the command was used and the ArgumentResult that is the result of the arguments
